headline: Ask HN: LI Posts and Getting a Job
description:
A lot of job seekers(#opentowork) are posting consistently on LinkedIn. Has writing and leading with voice, opinion helped land a job successfully?

Does it help get in view of hiring manager and recruiters.

If you are a job-seeker, has it helped you find the ideal job that you were looking for?

If you are a hiring manager/company placing candidates, do posts from candidates influence to know more about the candidate?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: LI帖子和找工作
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: LI帖子和找工作
description_zh-Hans:
很多求职者(#opentowork)都在LinkedIn上持续发帖。如果你是一个求职者，它是否帮助你找到了你想要的理想工作？

如果你是一个招聘经理/公司，来自候选人的帖子是否影响了对候选人的了解？
